title: LinkedIn
text2: Professional experiences and projects are maintained on LinkedIn.  Don't be shy to drop by- I endorse back!

title: Github
text2: I have a couple repos hosted there- this site included.  Although; the majority of my work is contributed to private repositories.

title: SoundCloud
text2: When I'm not coding, I spend my time producing music.  I'm still defining my sound, but let's just say I like to bring the bass.

title: Proto-Hack
text2: I've found that documenting my development process helps me retain and reproduce my results.  I hope that it's of use to hackers out there too.

title: Facebook
text2: Yes, I have friends.  I talk to them.  They talk to me.  For the most part, I think some of the actually like me.
